name: @netinsight/sye-tools
description: Tools for installing and managing a Sye Backend

scripts.tsc: tsc && rm -rf build/bin && mkdir build/bin && cp build/cli/sye.js build/bin/sye && cp build/cli/sye-aws.js build/bin/sye-aws && cp build/cli/sye-azure.js build/bin/sye-azure && cp build/cli/sye-aks.js build/bin/sye-aks && cp build/cli/sye-cluster.js build/bin/sye-cluster && cp build/cli/sye-eks.js build/bin/sye-eks && cp build/cli/sye-registry.js build/bin/sye-registry && chmod +x build/bin/* && cp sye-azure/bootstrap.sh build/sye-azure && cp sye-aws/bootstrap.sh build/sye-aws/ && cp sye-cluster-*.sh build && cp sye-eks/amazon-eks-nodegroup.yaml build/sye-eks && cp -R lib/prometheus* build/lib

author: Net Insight
